summary: Two sets of armor for Skyrim. Need help exporting correctly.
descriptionHtml: I have two full sets of armor nearly ready to be exported into Skyrim, but I am having issues getting the Chest, Shoulders, Gauntlets and Boots to export, the helmets will export fine but the animations are broken, they don\' move with the players head. I need someone who can help me figure out why these problems are occurring so I can fix them and finally get the armor in-game to use.
author: Trinz and Feauregarde
